title: Can Anyone ID the fonts used on this shirt, spotted in Brighton...
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202182027im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/DSC00042_6663.jpg)

 [‹ Marian Bantjes - Sugar typography](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202182027/http:/www.typophile.com/node/37140 "Go to previous forum topic") [Helvetica: The Film ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202182027/http:/www.typophile.com/node/27479 "Go to next forum topic")
author: sii

comments.content:
That’s funny. It’s the T-shirt Yves (Bald Condensed) announced here:

[http://typophile.com/node/37015](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202182027/http:/typophile.com/node/37015 "http://typophile.com/node/37015")

All I can tell you right away is that the a is Clarendon.
The rest is probably something like Platelet or Pennsylvania.

\> The rest is probably something like Platelet or Pennsylvania.

Neither nor.  
The unicase and rounded corners makes it pretty special.
[Katarine](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202182027/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/suitcase/katarine/) by Tomas Brousil. If I can’t be in Brighton at least I can play in the Type ID board from here.

You know what? I’m not even going to tag and credit this one. :^D

BTW Katarine is da bomb. I’m kinda partial to typefaces which have Petite Caps on top of Small Caps, because you can do kewl unicase stuff with them. Check it out on the Suitcase Type website!
Oh well. It was somewhat close. ;)
This is Yves, posting from Tamye’s computer because my internet at this crazy school in Brighton is not working. This is Helvetica Neue 87. Thank you.

It actually is really close, because my choice for this typeface was influenced by my love for [license plate type](http://web.archive.org/web/20081202182027/http:/www.fontshop.be/details.php?entry=57). It’s got those typical rounded corners and tense curves. ;^)
DO NOT BELIEVE HER! I CAN’T BELIEVE SHE’S NOT EVEN DRUNK YET! :^D :^D :^D
HELP! DON’T LISTEN TO HER. SHE STOLE MY COMPUTER!
This is insane: I don‘t know how this person is posting using my account - it‘s completely Helvetica. And who‘s not drunk yet?
Brighton seems a fun place to be :-)
Hi; this is Si, posting from Yves account - these moderator accounts are fun - who should I ban?
moved to general for more reads
Yves already banned me but I hacked back in.
